capsules_submitted.utterance: So I was reading about Snape's family history and it turns out he has a pretty complex lineage. Apparently, his mother was a Muggle, which makes him a half-blood wizard, but his father... well, that's where things get really interesting. He's got some mixed heritage, with both pure-blood and non-magical roots. I find it fascinating how Snape's background can shape who he is as a person.

capsules_submitted.utterance: Snape is an adult, and I have to admit, his age has played a significant role in shaping my perception of him as a character.
